mapper.select: SELECT T.*,DATE_FORMAT(T.CRITE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') CRITETIME,USR.USER_NAME FROM T_DITY_RATE T LEFT JOIN T_DITY_USER USR ON T.CRITE_USER = USR.USER_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DITY_RATE T SET T.RATE_NAME = #{RATE_NAME}, T.RATE_VAL = #{RATE_VAL},T.CRITE_USER = #{CRITE_USER}, T.CRITE_TIME = SYSDATE() WHERE T.ID = #{ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_DITY_RATE WHERE ID IN (${ID})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DITY_PRODUCT_TYPE T SET T.TYPE_ORDER = #{TYPE_ORDER}, T.TYPE_NAME = #{TYPE_NAME}, T.STATUS = #{STATUS}, T.FILE_URL = #{FILE_URL}, T.CRITE_USER = #{CRITE_USER}, T.CRITE_TIME = SYSDATE() WHERE T.ID = #{ID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_DITY_PRODUCT_TYPE WHERE ID IN (${ID})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_DITY_PRODUCT_TYPE SET STATUS = CASE WHEN STATUS = 0 THEN 1 WHEN STATUS = 1 THEN 0 ELSE STATUS END,CRITE_USER = #{CRITE_USER},CRITE_TIME = SYSDATE() WHERE ID = #{ID}
